data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Taizhou, Jiangsu, China to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Taizhou, Jiangsu, China
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, help the 80,693 believers in Taizhou to be spiritually intentional with their relationships among their 983,007 lost friends and neighbors.
Father, we pray for every movement leader and disciple in the county of Taizhou, Jiangsu, China that they would have deepening intimacy with you.
data.verse: On that day you will realize that I am in my Father, and you are in me, and I am in you.

data.prayer: Spirit, guide someone in the church in the county of Taizhou to a person ready to receive the message of the gospel, like Lydia, and who will then open her home to faith.
data.verse: One of those listening was a woman from the city of Thyatira named Lydia, a dealer in purple cloth. She was a worshiper of God. The Lord opened her heart to respond to Paul’s message.

data.focus_label: Pray for the city of Jiangyan
data.prayer: Pray that God raises up new churches in the city of Jiangyan, Jiangsu, China.

Spirit, build the strength and maturity of the local leaders in Taizhou, Jiangsu, China. Show them that faithfulness is more important than knowledge. Show them that the Spirit, the Word, and prayer is enough in order to grow and lead.
Jesus, you said you were the giver of evangelists to the church. Please, send more evangelists to the county of Taizhou, Jiangsu, China.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up

data.prayer: Father, please raise up new apostles to pioneer the growth of the church in Taizhou.
data.verse: So Christ himself gave the apostles, the prophets, the evangelists, the pastors and teachers, to equip his people for works of service, so that the body of Christ may be built up
